name: Chrono Cassette
description:
What if you could pause, rewind and play the world around you with just a cassette player?

Experience the benefits of time travel in this short puzzle game.

Use mouse to navigate text and move,

Click Play, Rewind and Pause butons to manipulate time. Press 'R' to restart level

Also works on mobile, although audio may be a bit choppy.

This game was created in 14 days just as a personal challenge.
